content: this legal text summarizes a notary document from july 21 2005 involving two parties pl and pf who are ending their joint ownership of a building in castelfidardo italy the building has multiple apartments and garages each with their own tax codes and cadastral data the parties agree to divide the property into two quotas with each party receiving specific real estate units and garages the value of each quota is specified the document also mentions the transfer of a roof terrace subject to necessary authorizations or approvals both parties guarantee ownership of their assigned units and waive any legal mortgages the expenses of the document are to be shared equally by the parties the document is signed by pl pf and the notary mb
